content: this legal text is about a specific case identified as case n° 110092022 it provides an overview of the progress of the case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case begins with a complaint filed by one party against another alleging certain actions or events that have caused harm or dispute the court reviews the allegations and determines if there is enough evidence to proceed if there is sufficient evidence the other party is notified and given an opportunity to respond both parties present their arguments and evidence and a hearing is scheduled after the hearing the court evaluates the evidence and arguments and makes a decision or judgment the judgment may include orders or instructions for the parties to follow in this specific case the court ordered the exwife to pay a sum of money and release a property in favor of the exspouses community of assets the court also addressed counterclaims and settled costs and fees the judgment was published on december 12 2022
